channel.title: [delta]player clipping
channel.description: Well, i've coded tutorial island for my server. I added npc clipping so the chicken(goblin) at the magic tutorial wouldn't run away but if a player click attack with melee it just runs through the barricade. How can i make it that it won't?

item.title: [delta]player clipping
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

Well, i’ve coded tutorial island for my server. I added npc clipping so the chicken(goblin) at the magic tutorial wouldn’t run away but if a player click attack with melee it just runs through the barricade. How can i make it that it won’t?
